com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra

Interface Settings

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MapSettings

    public interface Settings
    Configuration properties for the Cassandra.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Dmytro Nosan
    See Also:
    MapSettings

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAddress()
      The address to bind the native transport server to.
      String getBroadcastAddress()
      The IP address a node tells other nodes in the cluster to contact it by.
      String getBroadcastRpcAddress()
      RPC address to broadcast to drivers and other Cassandra nodes.
      String getClusterName()
      The name of the cluster.
      String getListenAddress()
      Address to bind to and tell other Cassandra nodes to connect to.
      String getListenInterface()
      The interface that Cassandra binds to for connecting to other Cassandra nodes.
      int getPort()
      Port for the CQL native transport to listen for clients on.
      String getRpcInterface()
      The listen RPC interface for client connections.
      int getRpcPort()
      Thrift port for client connections.
      Integer getSslPort()
      SSL Port for the CQL native transport.
      int getSslStoragePort()
      SSL port, for encrypted communication.
      int getStoragePort()
      The port for inter-node communication.
      boolean isStartNativeTransport()
      Whether native transport is started or not.
      boolean isStartRpc()
      Whether RPC transport is started or not.

    • Method Detail

      • getClusterName

        @Nullable
String getClusterName()
        The name of the cluster. This is mainly used to prevent machines in one logical cluster from joining another.
        Returns:
        The value of the clusterName attribute

      • getStoragePort

        int getStoragePort()
        The port for inter-node communication.
        Returns:
        The value of the storagePort attribute or -1

      • getSslStoragePort

        int getSslStoragePort()
        SSL port, for encrypted communication.
        Returns:
        The value of the sslStoragePort attribute or -1

      • getListenAddress

        @Nullable
String getListenAddress()
        Address to bind to and tell other Cassandra nodes to connect to.
        Returns:
        The value of the listenAddress attribute

      • getListenInterface

        @Nullable
String getListenInterface()
        The interface that Cassandra binds to for connecting to other Cassandra nodes.
        Returns:
        The value of the listenInterface attribute

      • getBroadcastAddress

        @Nullable
String getBroadcastAddress()
        The IP address a node tells other nodes in the cluster to contact it by.
        Returns:
        The value of the broadcastAddress attribute

      • getAddress

        @Nullable
String getAddress()
        The address to bind the native transport server to.
        Returns:
        The value of the address attribute

      • getRpcInterface

        @Nullable
String getRpcInterface()
        The listen RPC interface for client connections.
        Returns:
        The value of the rpcInterface attribute

      • getBroadcastRpcAddress

        @Nullable
String getBroadcastRpcAddress()
        RPC address to broadcast to drivers and other Cassandra nodes.
        Returns:
        The value of the broadcastRpcAddress attribute

      • isStartNativeTransport

        boolean isStartNativeTransport()
        Whether native transport is started or not.
        Returns:
        The value of the startNativeTransport attribute

      • getPort

        int getPort()
        Port for the CQL native transport to listen for clients on.
        Returns:
        The value of the nativeTransportPort attribute or -1

      • getSslPort

        @Nullable
Integer getSslPort()
        SSL Port for the CQL native transport.
        Returns:
        The value of the nativeTransportPortSsl attribute

      • isStartRpc

        boolean isStartRpc()
        Whether RPC transport is started or not.
        Returns:
        The value of the startRpc attribute

      • getRpcPort

        int getRpcPort()
        Thrift port for client connections.
        Returns:
        The value of the rpcPort attribute or -1
